quest.name: It's the Thought That Counts
journal: The Nonmind drone is trying to catch your attention.
The Nonmind drone wants to express her thanks to the Vath storyteller and the Vath who took her in. Help her by slaying hippocerfs and gathering three hippocerf skins.
You slay and skin the hippocerfs. Deliver the hides to the Nonmind drone.
The Nonmind drone gives the hides to the storyteller and fleetfoot to eat as a gift of thanks. Seeing them enthusiastically eating her gifts, she leaves on a journey to explore the realm.
Within moments of the drone's departure, the storyteller admits that the taste of the hippocerf skin was near-unbearably disgusting.
objectives: Slay hippocerfs and obtain hippocerf skins.
Deliver the skins to the Nonmind drone.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: Our new sister is a diligent worker─a tireless contributor to the hive. She mentioned that she wants to talk to you. Please go to her and find out what she wanted to discuss.

dialogue.name: IDATEN
dialogue.text: Our new sister said she wants to speak with you.

dialogue.name: GOODGNATHA01804
dialogue.text: We are Nonmind now. We think clearly now! We have left the hive, but we want to go even further. We want to see the realm!

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: <click> <click> We of the Nonmind─we are independent. As independent creatures, it stands that we ought be free.

dialogue.name: IDATEN
dialogue.text: Loth ast Vath is not like Loth ast Gnath. You may leave at any time. It is no prison. The Vath all live free.

dialogue.name: GOODGNATHA01804
dialogue.text: We owe the Vath a great debt of gratitude. <click> <click> Hunter, could you help us? We need three hippocerf skins.

dialogue.name: GOODGNATHA01804
dialogue.text: Please kill hippocerfs, hunter. Kill them and gather their hides for us.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: Our new sister is a diligent worker─a tireless contributor to the hive. She mentioned that she wants to talk to you. Please go to her and find out what she wanted to discuss.

dialogue.name: GOODGNATHA01804
dialogue.text: Do you have the hippocerf skins, hunter?

dialogue.name: GOODGNATHA01804
dialogue.text: Thank you, kind hunter. <click> <click> Hippocerf skin is truly exquisite─especially raw. Storyteller, please eat this hippocerf skin. Eat it as it is. It is truly exquisite.

dialogue.name: IDATEN
dialogue.text: <click> <click> If you insist. <munch> <munch> <munch> Yes...it truly is...exquisite!

dialogue.name: GOODGNATHA01804
dialogue.text: <click> <click> We are glad you like it! Now we intend to go out and see the realm.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: <spit> <spit> <spit> <click> That was truly disgusting. What terrible, terrible taste... But such is individuality.
